Package odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne

Class LearningMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • odu.edu.cs.cs350.pne.LearningMachine
  • public class LearningMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    A Learning machine uses a WEKA SMO (SVM) to retrieve a predicted category for each Classify Document. The Learning Machine uses the arff Data to construct a training Instances and the Classify Documents to contruct a classify Instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LearningMachine​(java.lang.String trainPath, VocabCollection tempVocab)
      Creates a Learning Machine with an arff file and an associated VocabCollection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void classifyData​(java.util.List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
      Classifies the classify Instances object using the SMO (SVM) and sets the category in each respective Classify Document.
      void constructAttributeInfo()
      Constructs the attribute info to be used in the creation of the classify Instances object.
      void createSMO()
      Constructs the SMO (SVM) using the training Instances object.
      void extractClassifyData​(java.util.List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
      Constructs the classify Instances object from a list of Classify Documents.
      java.util.ArrayList<weka.core.Attribute> getAttrInfo()
      Returns the associated Attribute Info
      weka.core.Instances getClassifyInstances()
      Returns the classify Instances object.
      weka.classifiers.functions.SMO getSVM()
      Returns the SMO (SVM).
      weka.core.Instances getTrainingInstances()
      Returns the training Instances object.
      VocabCollection getVocabCollection()
      Returns the associated VocabCollection.
      void readInARFF​(java.lang.String arffPath)
      Reads the data from an arff file into the training Instances object.
      void run​(java.util.List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
      Coordinates the execution of the Learning Machine by constructing the Attribute Info, extracting the data from the Classify Documents, and predicting the category of each Classify Document.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LearningMachine

        public LearningMachine​(java.lang.String trainPath,
                       VocabCollection tempVocab)
        Creates a Learning Machine with an arff file and an associated VocabCollection. Also, reads the arff file into the training Instances object.
        Parameters:
        trainPath - A path to an arff file
        tempVocab - A VocabCollection associated with the arff file

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run​(java.util.List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
        Coordinates the execution of the Learning Machine by constructing the Attribute Info, extracting the data from the Classify Documents, and predicting the category of each Classify Document.
        Parameters:
        documents - A list of Classify Documents to be classified.

      • readInARFF

        public void readInARFF​(java.lang.String arffPath)
        Reads the data from an arff file into the training Instances object.
        Parameters:
        arffPath - A path to an arff file

        Parameters:
        documents - A list of Classify Documents

      • createSMO

        public void createSMO()
        Constructs the SMO (SVM) using the training Instances object.

      • classifyData

        public void classifyData​(java.util.List<ClassifyDocument> documents)
